thread.title: WATCH: LeBron bends time and space with no-look pass
thread.title_full: WATCH: LeBron bends time and space with no-look pass

title: WATCH: LeBron bends time and space with no-look pass
text:
NBA WATCH: LeBron bends time and space with no-look pass LeBron James makes a mid-season entry for best assist of the season, going between Andrew Wiggins' legs with a no-look pass Published 7:18 PM, February 15, 2017 Updated 7:22 PM, February 15, 2017 DISH FACTORY. LeBron James had 14 assists, but one in particular stands out as the highlight of the night. File photo by Ronald Martinez/Getty Images/AFP 
MANILA, Philippines - LeBron can dunk . LeBron can chase down a fast breaking player for a block . And LeBron can thread the needle with laser precision. 
King James showed off that last quality with a no-look pass which bent time and space during the second quarter of Tuesday's (Wednesday Manila time) game between the Cleveland Cavaliers and the Minnesota Timberwolves. 
James pulled off one of the most mind-boggling assists you'll likely see this season, turning towards Kyle Korver on the perimeter, then firing a no-look bounce pass between the legs of Andrew Wiggins to find Derrick Williams under the basket for two points and the foul. 
The Cavs won 116-108 on the road , with James' 25 points, 14 assists and 8 rebounds helping overcome the 41 points of Wiggins for the victory. â€“ Rappler.com HOW DOES THIS STORY MAKE YOU FEEL? Happy
